modName: Lorgakh Yal-An Orc Stronghold Player Home
summary: A Orc Stronghold home with all crafting options, an orichalcum mine, and many beds for followers and spouses. An extremely lore friendly home perfect for people roleplaying as an Orc chief or for anyone who wants to experience the Orc way of living.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][center]Lorgakh Yal: An Orc Stronghold Player Home[/center][/size][size=3]

[center]I made this mod because I wasn't satisfied with the three Orc Stronghold mods I found out there. It's really a personal mod, but I thought some people would like it. This is my very first mod, so there may be bugs or clipping, although I did my best. Any bugs you find just post in the comments and I'll fix it.[/center]

﻿[u]Description: [/u][i]

Lorgakh Yal[/i] has replaced[i] Bilegulch Mine[/i], which is Southwest of [i]Fort Sungard[/i] and directly North of [i]Glenmoril Coven. [/i]Lorgakh Yal includes a longhouse with six beds for followers. There is a forge with a workbench, smelter, tanning rack, and a grindstone. The orichalcum mine has nine ore veins. There is an enchanter and alchemy table located outside. Also, a statue of Malacath watches over the stronghold, with an altar for offerings to him. Everything has been navmeshed so followers can navigate everything.
[u]
Requirements:[/u]

Just Skyrim updated to the latest version, no DLC's or other mods needed.
[u]
Bugs:[/u]

There are three radiant quests that may use this area. I have left the mine intact so you can still kill the bandit boss and complete the quests. There may be problems with the quest markers

[u]Recommended Mods:[/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36459/?]
Ghorza's Armor by atomec[/url]﻿-A great Orcish armor for females.
[url=http:////www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9378/?]Multiple Marriages... by Dudestia[/url]﻿-Absolutely essential for multiple wives (or husbands) and the Orsimer culture experience.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18045/?]My Home is Your Home by Volek[/url]﻿-Needed to make your followers live here.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks by Dheuster[/url]﻿-Can make any NPC your follower, I used this and the above to make Ghorza (the smith in Markarth) my smith at home.
[u]
Permission:[/u]

I don't want this reuploaded on other sites or reuploaded here with your own changes. If anybody wants to make a translation they are welcome to as long as they message me first.[/size]
author: fluffyfaery
